data.text: I xa n ma kiiti bolon,
I na n bɔɲɛ mato kɔɛ ra,
N birama i tan nan fɔxɔ ra,
Ala, n i xilima nɛ, barima i yaabi fima mixi ma.
Mɛɛni n ma alɔ i ya firinyie.
Na na a toma, mixi ɲaaxi naxee n nabilinxi,
Yɛtɛ igboe nan e ra, e dɛ igbo.
E bara fa n fɔxɔ ra yakɔsi,
E luxi alɔ yɛtɛ naxan sube fenma,
Alatala, keli! N yaxuie gere, i xa nɔ e ra.
N natanga na duniɲa mixi mɔɔlie ma,
Kɔnɔ n tan fama nɛ i yatagi tode tinxinyi saabui ra.
